page.title: 10A DAY FOR GARETH SWANAGE
page.content: After our playtime we do Country Dancing. At midday we eat our lunch. I usually have sandwiches and some orange juice. Sometimes I have a piece of cake. When we have finished eating we play for half an hour. After lunch we work on our reading scheme. At 2.30pm we play football but when the first bell rings we have to stand still until the second bell rings when we walk to our lines. Before going home at 3.30 we have Singing, Art or Religious-Education. I walk home with my sister and my Mum. When I get there I have my dinner and play with my friends or watch television until 7 o'clock when I go to bed.
